overview: Mustaev and Minko pick up the camera in the same rush as they grab the phone to film an emergency. For self-defense, as a measure of civil defense. Or out of a burning desire to capture an extraordinary phenomenon: for example, a story about how the leadership of a theater Institute forcibly imposes a dubious ideological production of the authorship of a certain Deputy on an entire group of students.
title: Pink Bag Torture
